entry.title: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Tele2
entry.summary: Jan 15, 16:01 PST Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed. Jan 15, 12:01 PST In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary. Jan 13, 09:31 PST Scheduled - The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting an emergency maintenance from 15 January 2023 at 12:00 PST until 15 January 2023 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Tele2 Russia handsets.

During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from a subset of handset in Denmark.

entry.title: SMS Delivery Delays to 9Mobile Network in Nigeria

Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

entry.title: Make intermittent login issues
entry.summary: Jan 11, 17:36 CET Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Jan 11, 12:00 CET Monitoring - The root cause of the issue has been identified and a remedy is already in place . Some users might have experienced troubles with logging in to the platform whilst we can confirm that there was no impact on running scenarios . We are actively monitoring the situation . Jan 11, 11:37 CET Investigating - We are currently experiencing intermittent issues when logging in to make zones . We are actively investigating the issue and working on a solution.

entry.title: 500 Errors Across Multiple Endpoints
entry.summary: Jan 9, 15:10 PST Resolved - From 14:00-15:00 Pacific Time (PT), we saw increased 500 errors for multiple API endpoints, including reservations, listings and threads. The issue is now identified and resolved, please retry any failed requests during this time. Apologies for the inconvenience caused due to this incident and thank you for your patience and understanding.

We will continue to keep users updated on progress towards mitigation. Jan 7, 22:50 UTC Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Actions.

entry.title: Delay in email delivery due to third-party outage
entry.summary: Jan 5, 15:49 UTC Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Jan 5, 02:25 UTC Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results. Jan 5, 01:45 UTC Update - We are continuing to monitor our third-party service provider for updates. Service has not been restored by the third-party email provider. Once service is restored, the majority of emails that were not sent during the outage will be resent. Jan 5, 01:14 UTC Update - We are continuing to monitor our third-party service provider for updates. Service has not been restored by the third-party email provider. Once service is restored, the majority of emails that were not sent during the outage will be resent. Jan 5, 00:38 UTC Update - Service has not been restored by the third-party email provider. Once service is restored, the majority of emails that were not sent during the outage will be resent. Jan 5, 00:17 UTC Identified - A fix has been implemented by the third-party service. We are working to confirm service has been restored. Jan 4, 23:31 UTC Investigating - Our third-party email delivery provider has been experiencing an outage since Jan 4th, 2:10 PM PST, causing a delay in notification delivery for all Rippling emails (including password resets). We are investigating this issue with the third-party provider.

entry.title: RESOLVED: We are experiencing an issue with Gmail, Google Chat, Google Voice. Our engineering team continues to investigate the issue. We will provide an update by Tuesday, 2022-12-13 10:30 US/Pacific with current details. Users may be facing unavailability for Gmail, Google Chat and Google Voice
entry.summary:
Incident began at 2022-12-13 15:34 and ended at 2022-12-13 18:04 (times are in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC)).

A combined Incident Report has been published on our Google Workspace Status Dashboard for this Incident - https://www.google.com/appsstatus/dashboard/incidents/AzeVS1iCHxhtzgi8r3mc

Affected products: Gmail

entry.title: Missing Workspace section in sidebar
entry.summary: Dec 21, 10:31 PST Resolved - We have implemented the fix and confirmed the issue is resolved. Workspace section and pages have been restored to the sidebar for affected users. Dec 21, 10:06 PST Identified - Since ~3:30pm Pacific time yesterday, some users on Free and Plus plans have been unable to see pages in the Workspace section of the sidebar. We have identified the root cause and a fix is in progress.

entry.title: Incident: Messages on iOS are automatically marked as read
entry.summary:
Issue summary:
From Monday December 12, 2022 at 10:27 AM PST to Monday December 19, 2022 at 1:30 PM PST, we began investigating reports of messages being marked as read when backgrounding the iOS app while in a conversation. As a result, the sidebar would not show unread messages next to the DM/Channel/Threads view.
We have now made a change on our end that resolved the issue and released a fix on iOS app version 22.12.21. Users on the iOS app should now be able to receive messages without them being marked as read automatically.
